title: Play
aim: Winner is the first to 2 points or the last left in the game after all others are eliminated.
deal: 1 Spade and 3 Hearts to each player
rank: Spades are Skulls, Hearts are Roses

actions.text: Random dealer: 3 Hearts and 1 Spade to each player.
actions.title: Deal

actions.text: From hand of cards select either Spade (Skull) or Heart (Rose) Face down.
actions.title: Play

actions.text: Starting with Lead Player (determined by previous round)
actions.title: Placement Phase

actions.text: Lay another card down.
actions.title: Play

actions.text: Start Challenge Phase (no further cards can be played).
actions.title: Make Bid

actions.text: Bid: say how many Hearts (Roses) you can turn over.
actions.title: Challenge Phase

actions.text: Clockwise from initial bidder
actions.title: Each Player

actions.text: Player may Raise Bid.
actions.title: Raise Bid

actions.text: Player is out of this Hand.
actions.title: Pass

actions.subtitle: Until all players have passed

actions.text: When all players have passed, Start Revelation Phase (no more bids can be made).
actions.title: Until

actions.text: Highest bidder attempts to make Bid by revealing cards.
actions.title: Revelation Phase

actions.text: Player must always turn over own cards first.
actions.title: Reveal Own Cards

actions.text: Player has Lost Hand.
actions.title: Skull

actions.text: One at a time reveal the top cards of other players.
actions.title: Reveal Other Cards

actions.text: Stop if you reveal a Skull.
actions.title: Skull

actions.text: Continue if you reveal a Rose
actions.title: Rose

actions.subtitle: Until bid is made.

actions.text: Player Scores 1 Point.
actions.title: Bid Success
actions.subtitle: No Skulls

actions.text: Lose 1 Card. Player of revealed Skull picks from shuffled set face down. If Player revealed own Skull, they may select a card. Discarded cards go in front of player and remain hidden.
actions.title: Bid Failure
actions.subtitle: Skull Revealed

actions.text: Highest bidder leads next hand whether they won or lost.
actions.title: Player In
actions.subtitle: Has cards remaining

actions.text: Bid Winner is out of the game, the Player of the revealed Skull leads.
actions.title: Player Out
actions.subtitle: No cards left

actions.text: Furst player to score 2 points or the last remaining player is the winner.
actions.title: Game End
